articles.author: Hafsa Adil
articles.title: Cricket: Hundreds of India vs Pakistan Asia Cup tickets unsold
articles.description: Fans and experts blame hot weather and lingering tensions between both nations for unusual ticket sales.
articles.content: Dubai, United Arab Emirates Dozens of tickets for the India vs Pakistan cricket match at the Asia Cup 2025 in Dubai remain unsold on the morning of the fixture, a rare occurrence for a cricket match … [+2430 chars]

articles.author: Jay Ganglani
articles.title: Asia Cup: Cricket teams from India and Pakistan meet for the first time since armed conflict in May
articles.description: As many as 500 million people could tune in to watch a cricket match between bitter rivals India and Pakistan, a number that would dwarf the viewership numbers set by this year’s Super Bowl nearly four times over.
articles.content:
Due to political tensions, the two nations have rarely played against each other in recent years, Shah said.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
